sysevent_email_template.message_text:
Dear ${sysapproval.assigned_to.first_name} ${sysapproval.assigned_to.last_name}
Short Description: ${sysapproval.short_description}
Priority: ${sysapproval.priority}
Category: ${sysapproval.category}
 
${mail_script:change_request_summary}
 
Comments:
${sysapproval.description}
${mailto:mailto.approval}
${mailto:mailto.rejection}
Approval Activity:
${mail_script:approval_activity}
Click here to view Approval Request: ${URI+&sysparm_record_target=sysapproval_approver}
Click here to view ${sysapproval.sys_class_name}: ${sysapproval.URI}
sysevent_email_template.name: MyDemo Approval Template
sysevent_email_template.subject: ${sysapproval.sys_class_name} ${sysapproval} Approval Request
